name: L2StandardBridge
description: L2StandardBridge. The L2 Standard bridge is a contract which works together with the L1 Standard bridge to enable ETH and ERC20 transitions between L1 and L2. This contract acts as a minter for new tokens when it hears about deposits into the L1 Standard bridge. This contract also acts as a burner of the tokens intended for withdrawal, informing the L1 bridge to release L1 funds.

functionDecorators.name: finalizeDeposit
functionDecorators.description: Complete a deposit from L1 to L2, and credits funds to the recipient's balance of this L2 token. This call will fail if it did not originate from a corresponding deposit in L1StandardTokenBridge.

parameterDecorators.name: _l1Token
parameterDecorators.description: Address for the l1 token this is called with.

parameterDecorators.name: _l2Token
parameterDecorators.description: Address for the l2 token this is called with.

parameterDecorators.name: _from
parameterDecorators.description: Account to pull the deposit from on L2.

parameterDecorators.name: _to
parameterDecorators.description: Address to receive the withdrawal at.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of the token to withdraw.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: Data provider by the sender on L1. This data is provided solely as a convenience for external contracts. Aside from enforcing a maximum length, these contracts provide no guarantees about its content.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: initiate a withdraw of some tokens to the caller's account on L1.

parameterDecorators.name: _l2Token
parameterDecorators.description: Address of L2 token where withdrawal was initiated.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of the token to withdraw. param _l1Gas Unused, but included for potential forward compatibility considerations.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: Optional data to forward to L1. This data is provided solely as a convenience for external contracts. Aside from enforcing a maximum length, these contracts provide no guarantees about its content.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawTo
functionDecorators.description: initiate a withdraw of some token to a recipient's account on L1.

parameterDecorators.name: _l2Token
parameterDecorators.description: Address of L2 token where withdrawal is initiated.

parameterDecorators.name: _to
parameterDecorators.description: L1 adress to credit the withdrawal to.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of the token to withdraw. param _l1Gas Unused, but included for potential forward compatibility considerations.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: Optional data to forward to L1. This data is provided solely as a convenience for external contracts. Aside from enforcing a maximum length, these contracts provide no guarantees about its content.
